cross_training_opportunities: Train a backend developer in basic Terraform plan/apply workflows.
contractor_augmentation_option: On-demand DevOps consultant for complex issues.
cost_optimization: High cost due to single senior resource; cross-training is key.
future_scaling: Not scalable; requires hiring a second platform engineer.

cross_training_opportunities: Mid-level developer can pair on advanced topics with senior dev.

future_scaling: Can handle an additional ~50 hours of work per sprint.

future_scaling: Bottleneck. Requires dedicated training or hiring.

cross_training_opportunities: Senior backend dev should review all payment-related code to provide backup.
